member.name: T:Telerik.OpenAccess.Query.IObjectScopeQuery`1
member.summary: Tagging interface so that the compiler can keep better track of whom to call in presence of all the Queryable extension methods. This allows Telerik.OpenAccess Linq queries to be compile-time checked and allows to produce warning messages for inefficient expressions.

member.name: M:Telerik.OpenAccess.ExtentQuery`1.IgnoreUncommitted(System.Boolean)
member.summary: This property determines whether the query execution is allowed to ignore the changes made in the current transaction, e.g. return objects which have been deleted in the current transaction.
member.param: True when uncommitted changes are ignored. (Default: True)
